verses.name: Psalms 132:13
verses.text: For the Lord hath chosen Zion; he hath desired it for his habitation.

verses.name: Psalms 132:14
verses.text: This is my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.

verses.name: Psalms 132:15
verses.text: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.

verses.name: Psalms 132:16
verses.text: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.

verses.name: Psalms 132:17
verses.text: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.

verses.name: Psalms 132:18
verses.text: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.
